column1: '''''Mallorn'' 58''' is the fifty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)

** "All Tales May Come True: Tolkien’s Creative Mysticism"

** "The Voice of Beorn: How Language Moralizes the Monstrous"
** "On Tolkien’s Presentation of Distributism through the Shire"
** "And What about Zanzibar? Or An Adult Fairy Tale Concerning Tolkien's Biographical Legend"
** "Eighteenth-Century Gothic Fiction and the Terrors of Middle-earth"

** By: [[Soni Alcorn-Hender]], John Cockshaw, Tsvetelina Krumova, and Gordon Palmer
